help.title: Administrator Management
help.information: An Administrator can take up changes on all data without any limitations. He has total access to every function of XAMS and thus can administrate all Resellers and where required even whose Customers.

section.head: Administrator Name
section.description: This is the Name of the Administrator as it is e.g. shown in the Event-Log. At login this name has to be prefixed by "adm_", so that XAMS knows wich kind of user it has to validate.

section.head: Administrator Password
section.description: In conjunction with the Name and this Password, the Administrator can login to the XAMS GUI.

section.head: Account locked
section.description: Using this option, an Administrator can lock other Administrators. Thereby he can't login the XAMS GUI anymore.
